Classic game.  Good game for drunk playing too.  I suck at the game and it is still fun so many years later.  Pretty sure every game you play on ranked there is at least 1 hacker in it though.

Have been playing this game for 3 years. Such a competitive game that makes you want to grind it out, makes you wanting to push your limits and even show off with the weapon skins and knives you have in your inventory! Tons of memories on this game. Truly an FPS masterpiece!

Please PLEASE do not get this game. It's all fun and addicting at first until you grow skill and realize that EVERYONE IN THIS GAME CHEATS. What I mean by everyone is that if you hop into a Competitive game (5v5) it's practically guaranteed that 3 people are cheating. Even if it were only 1 cheater your whole game could be ruined. I suppose you could play against bots but there's no fun in that. Do not get this game, do not become addicted. Valve needs to fix this cheater problem.

Die Tatsache das das Spiel " free to play" ist, macht es überhaupt erst Spielbar. Da man jederzeit mit freunden die Finanziell nicht gut aufgestellt sind, auch zusammen spielen kann.
